name: Asteroid B612
description:
The Story:

You are Explorer 101 and your honorable hierarchy has sent you in his place to the borders of the galaxy to watch over a mysterious creature.

Can you protect her until her master returns?

The Game :

The play area is a series of planets where the player can move 360 °

He can jump from one planet to another and be attracted by their gravitational field.

The goal of the game is to go and find the necessary  items for the creature's survival, and bring them back to her before it is too late.

Protect her from thirst, cold, insects and ... from the terrible space sheep!

How to play : On the ground :
  • Press the left or right arrow key to move
  • Press the up arrow key to take-off
Close to the creature :
  • Press the space bar to talk with her
  • Press "Y" to give her an item
In the air :
  • Press the left or right arrow key to modify your trajectory
